poem:
### Ceasefire

In the shadow  
of ceasefire,  
words cut deeper—  
hostages in the  
balance, the weight  
of threats thrown  
like dice.  
Fate sings a  
cacophony, voices  
lost in the static  
of power-play,  
suspended  
in a fragile pause—  
before all  
   breaks loose.
